Html: How does one generate X12 from the Model?  I would like to create a ClaimsDocument and transform that into an 837.  Is this doable?

Creating X12 is currently done by using the Interchange class.  See this discussion for example syntax:  http://x12parser.codeplex.com/discussions/265463.

The ClaimsDocument is meant to be a very user-friendly model for defining business logic on incoming claims that are for the most part read-only.

A future release may include a transformation from the ClaimsDocument to an 837 message, but this is not on the immediate road-map.  If you would like this, add this as a feature request on the "Issue Tracker" page.
Thanks for the reply.  I will add as a feature request and will build using the Interchange Class as you suggested.
